meanings.definition: To cause a ship to be destroyed or sunk
meanings.sent1: The stormy weather can shipwrecks vessels if not careful.
meanings.sent2: Pirates sometimes shipwrecks ships to steal their cargo.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous cat tried to shipwrecks the toy boat in the bathtub.
meanings.sent4: The loud music shipwrecksed my concentration during the test.
meanings.sent5: His reckless actions shipwrecksed his chances of winning the race.
